metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14332 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine when using module_args. Tasksexecuted with check mode (--check-mode) do not properly neutralizesensitive data exposed in the event data. This flaw allows unauthorizedusers to read this data. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
